Body:
"""Test search filters are applied to GB API call."""
res = games_client.search({'name': 'game name'})
assert isinstance(res, Response)
assert res.uri == mock_response.url
mock_response_json = mock_response.json()
assert res.results == mock_response_json['results']
assert res.num_page_results == mock_response_json['number_of_page_results']
assert res.num_total_results == mock_response_json['number_of_total_results']
mock_requests_get.assert_called_once_with('http://www.giantbomb.com/api/games',
    params={'filter': 'name:game name', 'api_key': 'fake_key', 'format':
    'json'}, headers={'User-Agent': 'Pybomb {}'.format(version)})
